about_the_game:
This chilling horror game awakens you to a solo mission to escape your own home. It begins as you are startled from a deep slumber, trapped in a ghoulish nightmare until you figure out how to run out the front door.

You feel something lurking in the dark house, and every creaky step, squeaking open door and light switch flicker is unnerving as you anticipate what will come around the corner or come at you down the hall. Search every nook and cranny to find the key to escape the house you’re trapped in before a ghoul snatches your life and you wake from your slumber again. And again.

This point-and-click adventure game challenges you to figure out how to escape the haunted house from one of three ghouls, each with its own unique mechanic.
